mapper.insert: insert into tal_cart(cart_id, member_id, product_id, product_count) values(seq_cart_id.nextval, #{member_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_count})
mapper.update: update tal_cart set product_Count=#{product_Count} where cart_id = #{cart_id}
mapper.select: select * from tal_cart where member_Id = #{member_Id} and product_id = #{product_id}

select b.cart_id, a.product_kor_name ,a.product_price as point_earned, a.product_image, a.product_id, b.product_count as product_amount, (a.product_price*b.product_count) as total_price,b.member_id from tal_cart b full join tal_product a on a.product_id = b. product_id where b.member_id = #{member_id} order by b.cart_id

select sum(a.product_price * b.product_count) as sum_total_price, sum(b.product_count) as sum_product_amount, sum(a.product_price) as sum_point_earned from tal_cart b full join tal_product a on a.product_id = b.product_id where b.member_id = #{member_id}

select a.cart_id, a.member_id, a.product_id, a.product_count, b.product_name, b.product_price, b.product_discount from tal_cart a left outer join tal_product b on a.product_id = b.product_id where member_Id = #{member_id} order by cart_id
